mapper.select: select id, mainOrderNo, revenueOrderNo, goodsId, goodsCode, goodsName, resourceCode, type, memberId, status, reason, buyTime, activeTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser from union_order.revenue_order_info where id = #{id}

select id, mainOrderNo, revenueOrderNo, goodsId, goodsCode, goodsName, resourceCode, type, memberId, status, reason, buyTime, activeTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser from union_order.revenue_order_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into union_order.revenue_order_info(mainOrderNo, revenueOrderNo, goodsId, goodsCode, goodsName, resourceCode, type, memberId, status, reason, buyTime, activeTime, createTime, createUser, updateTime, updateUser) values (#{mainorderno}, #{revenueorderno}, #{goodsid}, #{goodscode}, #{goodsname}, #{resourcecode}, #{type}, #{memberid}, #{status}, #{reason}, #{buytime}, #{activetime}, #{createtime}, #{createuser}, #{updatetime}, #{updateuser})
mapper.update:
update union_order.revenue_order_info
mainOrderNo = #{mainorderno},
revenueOrderNo = #{revenueorderno},
goodsId = #{goodsid},
goodsCode = #{goodscode},
goodsName = #{goodsname},
resourceCode = #{resourcecode},
type = #{type},
memberId = #{memberid},
status = #{status},
reason = #{reason},
buyTime = #{buytime},
activeTime = #{activetime},
createTime = #{createtime},
createUser = #{createuser},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
updateUser = #{updateuser},
where id = #{id}
